successes.title: Folding USB Solar Cell
successes.description: An inexpensive, easy to use, practical, every day solar USB system.  For those of us not just preparing for the end of the world.

Pledges.description: You support us in a small way.  Like providing us with a cheap cup of coffee from that greasy eatery down the street.  As your reward we'll film ourselves saying your name at fun places around Milwaukee.  We'll post it online so you can brag to your friends about it.

You've supported us in more than a small way.  We can now buy a cup of Chai tea or a yummy Milwaukee beer.  As a reward we'll film ourselves toasting your name at some local Milwaukee tea or beer houses.  We'll post it online so you can brag to your friends about it.
You get a USB Power Bank!  Rejoice!  Thats USB power to the tune of 2600mAh.  Comes in sexy black along with a USB cable and a pack of adaptors.  Has a built in 1W flashlight! Add $5 for US shipping.
Get a 5600mAh Power Bank.  In stylish black!  Add $5 for US Shipping.
I see someone is showing off their wallet.  You'll get one of our 5W folding Solar Cells.  It has USB out for direct solar charging.  Add $5 for US shipping.

SUPER MEGA POWER PLAY!  Or something like that.  At this amount you'll get a black lithium Power Bank that clocks in at 10,000mAh.  Thats enough to charge an iPhone 4 times.  Has two USB ports, one at 1 Amp and the other at 2 Amps.  Also features battery status LEDs and comes with an adaptor pack.  Add $5 for US Shipping.
You're getting one of our 7W Folding USB Solar Cells!  It has USB out on it for direct solar charging.  Add $5 for US Shipping.
Complete package. 5W Solar Cell with USB out.  A black 2600mAh Lithium Pack with built in flashlight and adaptors.  What more could you ask for?  Add $5 for US shipping.
Clearly you have needs that are not being met.  At this reward level you'll get a 10W Folding USB Solar Cell.  Thats 5V at 2 Amps, enough for the most power hungry gear.  Add $5 for US Shipping.
Mega Package.  You'll get a 7W Folding Solar Cell.  A black 5600mAh Lithium Pack with adaptors.  Add $5 for US shipping.

Total Wattage Package.  You'll get a 10W Folding USB Solar Cell and a black 10,000mAh lithium Power Bank.  Power Bank has 2 USB ports that clock in at 1 Amp and 2 Amps of output, status LEDs, and an adaptor set.  Please add $5 for US shipping.

The "Significant Other" package.  One 5W and one 7W Folding Solar Cell.  Two 2600mAh USB Power Banks, one blue and one black (with adaptors).  We'll even throw in a USB Flex Light.  Add $5 for US shipping.
The "One of Everything" package.  One 5W and 7W Solar Cell.  One 2600mAh and one 5600mAh solar cell.  One flex LED light, one AA/AAA charger, and one Universal Camera adaptor.  Add $5 for shipping.

The "Wild Man of the Mountain" pack.  Two 5W, and two 7W Solar Cells.  Two 5600mAh Power Pack and two 2600mAh Power Packs.  A USB Flex LED Light.  A Universal Camera Battery Charger.  A USB Powered AA/AAA Charger.  Plusssss we'll even throw is some cables for hooking these things up to your backpack.  Add $5 for US shipping.

The "due to popular request" reward.  Get one of each 5W, 7W, and 10W Folding USB Solar Cells.  Get one of each 2600mAh, 5600mAh, and 10,000mAh lithium Power Banks.  I'll also throw in an AA/AAA USB Charger, a USB Flex LED Light, and a Universal Camera Battery Charger.  Plus 6 little bungie cords so you can hook up all the cells up to your backpacks or tents.  (Also free shipping within the USA because you're clearly spending heaps of money on this project.)
The "No one is really going to buy this" Package.
